competitors.name: Veeam
competitors.notes: Market leader with 20.28% share, cloud-first approach

competitors.name: Druva
competitors.notes: Cloud-native SaaS backup using AWS infrastructure

competitors.notes: Backup with integrated cybersecurity and ransomware protection

context: By 2020, cloud-native solutions gained prominence. Veeam became market leader with 20.28% share. CommVault held 5.49% share. Ransomware protection became critical requirement.
